name: Federico Ciccozzi
content: Federico Ciccozzi – Federico Ciccozzi Skip to content Federico Ciccozzi Professor in Computer Science About me I am a Professor in Computer Science at the School of Innovation, Design and Engineering of Mälardalen University in Västerås, Sweden, where I lead the Automated Software languages and SOftware engineering (ASSO) research group. I am also Head of Research Education in the Embedded Systems research area. Here you can find information about my current research activities, including projects, publications, etc. I have been impressed with the urgency of doing. Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Being willing is not enough; we must do. Leonardo da Vinci Tweets by federicoCic Privacy & Cookies: This site uses cookies. By continuing to use this website, you agree to their use.
